name: Network Cloud Cube-2
short_description:
Network Cloud Cube-2 is the concept of network infrastructure, based on cloud computing. Infrastructure idea is to combine the low-end and high-performance computing resources in a computing environment using virtualization layer and interfaces.
Network Cloud Cube-2 is a model of hyper virtualization digital universe, which brings together the federation of clouds. We propose a series of models that are part of a unified infrastructure concept: Converged Model, Cloud Model, Telemetering Cloud, Model of Hyper Virtualization, IoTPaaS, dynamic security model Converged Security Model, Cloud Ring, routing model in a converged infrastructure, Cloud-to-Cloud and Fabric -to-Fabric.
